title: (potential) massive flaw in the game
body:
so
was in a lobby TWICE with a "player" didn't pick any bans and instalocks ashe. he refused to talk and when the game connects he moved a bit then disconnects.
i suspect this could be someone on the other team using another computer to q up at the same time, so they can get a 5v4 advantage.
it's possible to get matched up if the 2 accounts are about the same rank and mmr. my friend and i do it all the time because he believes the matchmaking system will give u bad team mates if you duo q.
has anyone else ran into this before?
edit: should i be posting this somewhere different?

replies.body:
more to the point u just posted on the forums that you and your friend actually do the exact same thing your here complaining about...

 
> my friend and i do it all the time because he believes the matchmaking system will give u bad team mates if you duo q.

Obviously he doesn't mean he uses his friend to make the enemy lose, he means that they try to get in the same team without duo Q
read between the lines.

While it certainly could happen, its very unlikely that you would be matched into opposite teams, and the reverse is also possible, you could be matched into the same team, and have to dodge which puts one account behind,

and either way you have to be the same rank and mmr, yet if you use one account to lose all the time you arent going to have very high mmr on it, and if the other account keeps winning then the two will cease to be matched together, so while its possible i doubt its an effective thing to do (as well as being totally imorral and unfair)
